attributes.action: End Furlough for those who break lockdown
attributes.additional_details: The only way to control the virus is to limit its transmission. Currently we are in lockdown and people are ignoring the rules for example the demo in Manchester today 09/11/2020. Many of the people I know who have broken the rules now and over the summer have been furloughed. If breaking the rules resulted in them losing their benefit I believe this would make them think more carefully before doing so.
attributes.background: I want the Furlough benefit terminated for anyone who breaks the rules relating to the control of the virus. Be that breaking the current lockdown or if & when we go back to tiers breaking the rules related to each tier.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We understand that you want people breaking Covid-19 restrictions to be subject to greater penalties, but the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme provides a grant to employers who furlough their staff due to coronavirus. It does not pay that money directly to the individual.

Fines for committing offences by breaking the restrictions are imposed by the police. You could start a new petition calling for the Government to increase the penalties for breaking these rules.
